summary:
Experienced Managing Director with a demonstrated history of working. Strong business development professional skilled in Operations Management, International Relations, English, Management and Business Development. But also good in advising and consulting policymakers in the government. 

Experienced and internationally oriented dedicated specialist in chain logistics, IT and international trade with extensive experience in directing and managing cross-cultural projects and teams In Europe and between Europe and China.   Experienced in analysing and developing solutions in chain logistics and manufacturing, in which he is not afraid to use of data and IT systems. But never forge the human side and input.
Experienced in import and export procedures for customers in relation to the Chinese and European market. He is an all-rounder, understands how chains and people work and no problem is too difficult for him. He is a flexible quick learner and is capable to switch quickly with problem solution as the focus. 
Due to his long experience in doing business In and with China as governmental representative, as an independent entrepreneur and as a manager, he is able to communicate well with administrators and decision makers without losing sight of reality and feasibility. 

Also experienced on matters on the cutting edge of the public and private work domain. Having assisted local governments in their foreign relations or acted as a sparring partner for people in descisionmaking positions in the public and commercial field in the period up to 2019,l. 
Wubbo is Political and cultural sensitive. And can switch quickly and separate main from side issues when under pressure in a political and administrative environment. Accustomed to being on the road and offering advice to stakeholders in the public domain.

profile_positions.description: Trade, distribution, developing products known in Chinese medicine for the European / German market. In close collaboration with Prof. dr. C. H. Hempen (www.hempen.de) which is a doctor professor at the Technical university Munich (TUM) (www.sg.tum.de/studium/studiengaenge/msc- traditionelle-chinesische-medizin) and the international ensemble for TCM ( SMS) (www.tcm.edu). The rights of this Qinax brand are partly owned. A collection of on cockroach-based TCM products and OEM products from Yunnan bai yao are prepared following the European food law and now ready for distribution as food and herbal supplements in Europe.
profile_positions.title: Managing Director

profile_positions.description:
Nunner is a leading provider of logistics services. The company offers an integrated portfolio of logistic services covering the total supply chain from source to end-user. Nunner designs, develops, integrates markets and operates advanced logistics solutions used by customers – in all ranges of industry and trade – to create a transparent, cost efficient, and reliable supply chain and distribution system. Nunner is committed to providing customers with leading edge services, enabling customers to gain and sustain a competitive edge in the marketplace. Nunners’ corporate headquarters is located in Helmond, the Netherlands. 
Facilities are located in Austria, Germany, Russia, Switzerland, Spain, Czech Republic, Lithuania, Estonia, Poland, Romania, Slovenia and The Netherlands. 
As business developer China Rail I'm developing new products, lines and manage existing together with the Nunner rail/ road team for China Rail. Manage communication and connections with the Chinese platforms, rail operators, European ad on road and rail services to the China Rail / Belt and road hubs like Tilburg and Duisburg.
profile_positions.title: Business Development Manager China

profile_positions.description: As result of years of relationbuilding and joined activities the municipalities Wuhan an Yichang invited me to take the honor to represent them abroad. The aim of the function is to build a bridge between Holland / Germany and Hubei and to support companies, institues and businesses on both sides to invest and make businesses between eachother and between the partner Cities and regions in Holland and Germany. Currently we are preparing in cooperation with the municipality of Arnhem, province of Gelderland and Oost NV to open a Wuhan/Yichang Office in Arnhem.  Update wil follow soon!
profile_positions.title: Foreign Investment Consultant

profile_positions.description:
WAE logistic trade Holland Bv have a close connection with Wuhan Asia - Europe logistics co. Ltd ( WAE). WAE is the operator of International rail freight transport between Europe and Wuhan. It's a public platform formed by the Municipal Government of Wuhan that provides international logistic and trade services. WAE is based in Wuhan, Radiates across central China and Europe and offers tailored supply chain services for customers. 
WAE Logistic Trade Holland bv is the exclusive forwarding and trade partner for the Benelux.   WAE logistic trade Holland bv provide trade and forwarding and central China Market entry services for enterprises and is mainly focused high vallue goods or food en agro product.
Our WAE trade and market development department offer trade facilities, chinese certification facilities, off-line and online market places and . Our WAE logistic services bv offer regular train services for companies who one or several containers per shipment dedicated train services foor big manufactures, and LCL services. WAE developes his own  reefer containers equipped with diesel generator that an transport goods in an off-line mode for 20 days. The tracking GPS system provides 24-hrs monitoring of the containers' location and temperature. Besides, the real time control on the container conditions and fuel levels are available. because of the close cooperation we are in the radius of 1200 km around Wuhan connected with 90% of the GDP and 85% of the population in China. WAE Wuhan profound influence in developing an international industrial, agro and food processing cluster and making the city of Wuhan a center of multimodal International logistics, shipping and trading.  WAE Logistic trade Holland profound to connect Dutch and Belgium industries and food agro clusters to this development and make them a part in the development of this international chain. 
for more information please send a email to  Wubbo@waelogistics.com or call +31 (0)88 44420360.
profile_positions.title: Manager Partner Benelux

profile_positions.description:
YUN LOGISTICS LTD is the fast growing provider of shipping, logistics, marine and related services between the Worldwide and China markets. Since the company started operations in the mid-2012, the Group has steadily expanded its geographical coverage and range of operations to serve customers around the world. Today, it is a truly global operator serving the shipping, logistics, marine and related industries on all continents. 

Headquartered is located at Shenzhen,China.with branch offices at Hong Kong,Guangzhou and Shanghai giving total coverage of all of the major Ports & Airports in China. 

YUN LOG places a strong emphasis on delivering the highest quality professional customer service throughout the company, backed up with strategic alliances around the globe and together with our partners, is willing to offer full Import, Export & Cross Trade Services on a Door-to-Door basis;YUN  delivers on its promises with day-to-day activities that represent value for money, quality, continuity, innovation and global reach, offering services that seamlessly combine its expertise and experience in the shipping, logistics, marine and related fields. 

More than 100 agents around the world, speaking most of the world's major languages and representing most of the world's cultures, make up the YUN LOG community. Wherever you from,wherever you go, you will find YUN LOG professionals dedicated to working together to provide the best possible service as they work across cultures, borders and time zones. So, from Domestic to International Transportation on a Door-to-Door basis, YUN LOG is your One Stop Global Logistics Solution.

www.yunglobal.nl
profile_positions.title: Co partner

profile_positions.description:
Granch Biopack is one of the largest professional producers of CPP and Bio-based film and bags in China, with advanced technological research,Own Patents, production and sales. Granch biopack is dedicated to developing Environmentally friendly packaging products for the Chinese and Foreign markets

Our products can be divided into two major series of products. A. CPP/FPP high performance standard printing film, ranges of perforated breathable film, bio-based, compostable PLA packaging films, and laminated film, etc. B. Wicket Blocked bag, perforated breathable bread bags, drawstring bags, block bottom bags, flower/plant sleeves, Eco Compostable bags, laminated and printed bags, etc.
We are approved by BRC, SGS, AND FDA. Our Bio-based, compostable packaging film meets national standard, EU EN13432 and USA ASTMD6400.

Guancheng have cooperation with companies in biobased technology from Japan and USA 
In 2016 Granch biopack established a Vomapny in Holland off under the name of GRANCH Biopack Europe BV to get closer and establish more and better service to our current European customers to and get better in touch with Dutch and German bioplastic biobased material companies to cooperate in 
R&D and sales on Chinese market
profile_positions.title: Advisor

profile_positions.description:
I-REN BV

I-Ren is specialized in the cross cultural exchange between Holland/ Germany to China. It offers its clients assistance in the entire process with regard to the internationalization of the environment of your business especially with regarding to China. Activities which can be thought of are:

 - Recruitment and selection of professionals;
 - Market introduction;
 - Cross Cultural consultancy;
 - Business / company setup;  
 - Consultancy and project management;
 - Cross cultural Business and Market Concept development 

Present Activities 
Municipality of Arnhem / province of Gelderland/ Oost NV 2016 
Quickscan; Reprofiling the relationships from Gelderland and Arnhem based on the new development and changing economical reality in china in general and in specific the City if Wuhan and partner provinces Hubei, Fujian, Shandong 

WAE logistics ltd 2016 
investigate the position of WAE in the logistic market of Holland and Germany and working out the MOU between WAE and Oost NV/ Municipality of Arnhem in order to develop a Railway connection between Arnhem region and Wuhan specialized in transport of food and Milkpowder. 

Municipality of Arnhem 2015-2016 
Advising in organization and assisting in matchmaking for the official delegation visit of the mayor of Arnhem to Wuhan. Assisting in writing and communicating and signing of 5 Mou’s.

Guancheng bioplastics ltd 2014-2016
Advising, market research and introduction support. Result: setup of a branche office Granch Biopack Europe BV in Holland in august 2016

Kiwidada ltd 2016
Introducing, matchmaking and market research; Result is a setup of a European office june 2016.
  
Yun logistics ltd 2014
Matchmaking, market development, setup European office in 2014

profile_positions.description:
NBCG Yi is officieel opgericht in 2006. Wij zijn een jonge en innovatieve vereniging binnen de gevestigde orde, een vereniging met verstand van zaken van de Traditionele Chinese Geneeswijzen. Wij krijgen adviezen van professoren en wetenschappers van Chinese universiteiten. Ons hoofdbestuur houdt zich alleen bezig met beleid, terwijl een jong en enthousiast team van ondernemers zich bezighoudt met de werkzaamheden binnen de vereniging.

De resultaten zijn niet uitgebleven in deze korte periode. Wij kunnen met trots zeggen, dat wij in 5 jaar 40 verzekeringsmaatschappijen hebben geregistreerd die onze beroepsvereniging in hun polisvoorwaarden hebben opgenomen en zo de vergoeding van behandelingen mogelijk maken. wij zijn in het afgelopen jaar verdubbeld in ons leden aantal en dagelijks komen er nieuwe aanmeldingen binnen 

In het afgelopen jaar hebben wij 2 contracten binnen weten te halen voor een samenwerking met de Chang Chun University of Chinese Medicine en de Zhejiang Chinese Medical University voor het volgen van de laatste ontwikkelingen op het gebied van de toepassing van deze geneeswijzen.

In november 2008 zijn wij officieel toegetreden tot The World Federation of Acupuncture Moxibustion Societies (WFAS), welke relaties onderhoudt met de World Health Organization (WHO).

In 2010 zijn wij toegetreden tot de Nederlandse normcomisie (tc249) om te komen tot een internationale ISO standaarden in de Chinese geneeswijzen. 

in 2010 zijn wij tiegetreden tot de Koepel SRBAG waardoor een verdere groei van de vereniging is gewaarborgd 

In 2011 heeft de NBCG YI de 2e internationale vergadering van ISO TC249 in Den Haag mogeklijk mogelijk gemaakt.
profile_positions.title: Secretaris
